To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 27 to 45 years Responsibilities & Context Oversee multiple construction projects within the assigned sub-zone. Ensure projects are executed as per approved plans, drawings, schedules, and budgets. Monitor overall progress and ensure timely completion of works. Support site teams in resolving execution and coordination issues. Assist in preparation and review of project execution plans and schedules. Coordinate between site engineers, contractors, consultants, and zonal office. Ensure availability of manpower, materials, and equipment at project sites. Facilitate inter-departmental coordination (planning, procurement, QA/QC, HSE). Ensure implementation of safety and environmental policies at all sites. Monitor site safety practices and compliance with statutory regulations. Support safety audits, inspections, and corrective action implementation. Promote safe work culture across the sub-zone. Supervise site engineers, supervisors, and support staff in the sub-zone. Provide technical guidance and mentoring to site teams. Evaluate team performance and recommend training or corrective measures. Promote discipline, productivity, and teamwork. Prepare and submit periodic progress, quality, cost, and safety reports. Maintain records of project status, issues, and risk mitigation actions. Update zonal management on achievements, delays, and challenges. Identify risks, bottlenecks, and improvement opportunities in sub-zonal projects. Support implementation of best practices and standard operating procedures. Assist zonal management in audits, reviews, and strategic initiatives. Dhaka (Kawran Bazar, Mohakhali) Salary: Tk. 15000 - 18000 (Monthly) Published: 03 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 22 to 35 years Strong team player with the ability to collaborate effectively across teams. High attention to detail with a strong focus on accuracy and quality. Willingness and ability to work from the office as required. Proficient in Microsoft Office and Google Workspace, with strong expertise in Excel/Google Sheets and PowerPoint/Google Slides. Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English. Basic knowledge of online marketing and digital advertising will be considered an added advantage. Demonstrated critical thinking skills with sound judgment and practical problem-solving ability. Ability to work in rotational shifts from 02:00 PM to 11:00 PM and 10:00 PM to 07:00 AM; night shift availability is mandatory. Responsibilities & Context SEBPO is looking for experienced or fresh graduates who want to build their careers in the Digital Advertising Industry by working in our Digital Advertising Team. This role works cross-functionally to ensure digital campaigns are set up correctly in production systems, delivery objectives are met, and clients and partners are appropriately billed. Trafficking and QA display and video campaigns/creatives across desktop, mobile, and tablet. Troubleshooting Ad Delivery and creative issues. Pulling and analyzing reports from various third-party platforms/Ad servers to monitor campaign delivery. Performing accounts with cross-functional partners/clients. Managing the work time and prioritizing tasks according to the client’s needs. NIGHT SHIFT for male employees is in WFO - Work From Office mode and female employees is in WFH - Work From Home mode after confirmation OR as and when requested by the team. কম্পিউটার অপারেটর : Graphics Ad Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Graphics Ad কম্পিউটার অপারেটর Application Deadline : 26 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Company Information Summary Vacancy: 01 Age: 18 to 30 years Location: Chattogram Salary: Negotiable Published: 16 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 18 to 30 years Responsibilities & Context জরুরী নিয়োগ একটি গ্রাফিক্স এ্যাড্ ফার্মের জন্য বাংলা ও ইংরেজি টাইপ জানা একজন দক্ষ কম্পিউটার অপারেটর আবশ্যক। মোটামুটি কাজ জানা হলেও চলবে। গ্রাফিক্সের কাজ শিখিয়ে নেওয়া হবে। ডিজাইন তৈরি: ক্লায়েন্টের নির্দেশনানুযায়ী ব্যানার, লিফলেট, ক্যাটালগ, বই, এবং প্যাকেজিংয়ের সৃজনশীল ডিজাইন তৈরি করা। প্রি-প্রেস প্রিপারেশন: প্রিন্টিংয়ের জন্য ফাইল রেডি করা (যেমন- bleed, margin, bleed, Resolution, CMYK মোড সেট করা)। সফটওয়্যার দক্ষতা: Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign বা CorelDRAW-তে দক্ষ হতে হবে। Skills & Expertise COMPUTER OFFICE MANAGEMENT Computer Literacy Data Entry Operator/ Supervisor Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Gender Only males are allowed to apply. We specialize in premium nuts, seeds, spice pastes, and natural food products, catering to a rapidly growing market.
Founded in Bangladesh in 2020, AgroAcres began its journey with whole spices, nuts, healthy products, and thoughtfully curated gifting items. At AgroAcres, we combine quality, convenience, and care to support modern lifestyles. job_title: Diploma Engineer - IoT Device Development & Support
job_description: Diploma Engineer - IoT Device Development & Support : Data Head Pvt. Ltd. Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Data Head Pvt. Ltd. Diploma Engineer - IoT Device Development & Support Application Deadline : 06 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Company Information Summary Vacancy: 2 Age: 18 to 25 years Location: Dhaka Salary: Negotiable Published: 24 Feb 2026 Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 18 to 25 years Strong knowledge of:Analog & digital electronics Microcontrollers (Arduino/ESP32/STM/others) Sensors and measurement systems Power supply design (SMPS, battery systems) Basic understanding of IoT communication protocols. Ability to read circuit diagrams and technical drawings. Hands-on soldering and PCB troubleshooting skills. Basic computer skills. Responsibilities & Context Job Summary We are looking for a skilled and motivated Diploma Engineer (Electrical & Electronics) to work on our IoT-based devices such as Smart Scale and other work-done measurement systems. The candidate will be involved in circuit design, prototyping, testing, assembling, troubleshooting, and customer technical support. Key Responsibilities IoT Device Development Assist in design and development of IoT-based smart devices. Work with sensors, load cells, microcontrollers, communication modules (WiFi/GSM/Bluetooth, etc.). Support firmware integration and hardware-software interfacing. Circuit Design & PCB Design, analyze, and modify analog and digital circuits. Prepare schematic diagrams and assist in PCB layout. Component selection and BOM preparation. Assembly & Prototyping Assemble prototype devices. Soldering (SMD/through-hole), wiring, and enclosure fitting. Ensure proper grounding, shielding, and safety standards. Testing & Calibration Perform functional testing and calibration of smart scale and measurement devices. Identify and fix hardware issues. Conduct field testing and performance validation. Troubleshooting & Maintenance Diagnose and repair faulty boards and devices. Provide technical support to customers (remote and onsite if required). Maintain service and repair records. Documentation Prepare technical documentation, test reports, and maintenance logs. Assist in user manual preparation. Continuous Improvement Suggest design improvements for better efficiency and cost reduction. Support R&D activities for new product development. Skills & Expertise Assembly Calibration IoT device Microcontroller PCB design Prototyping Sensors Testing Suggested by Assembly Calibration IoT device PCB design Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Job Location Dhaka Company Information Data Head Pvt. Ltd. Follow Address: 43, Eskaton Garden Road, Dhaka 1000 Business: Software development & implementation,  and Others IT enable services Report this Job / Company (রিপোর্ট) রিপ

Project Engineer (Civil Engineering) : Farr Bulders & Landmark Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Farr Bulders & Landmark Project Engineer (Civil Engineering) Application Deadline : 05 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Age: 28 to 45 years Location: Dhaka Salary: Negotiable Published: 24 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 28 to 45 years Age preference is flexible for highly deserving candidates. Proven track record in residential, commercial, or mixed-use developments. Strong, practical knowledge of modern construction methodologies, materials, and project management. Technical proficiency in AutoCAD, MS Project, and MS Office. Strong understanding of BOQ preparation, cost control, and material estimation. Sound knowledge of BNBC (Bangladesh National Building Code) and other relevant compliance standards. Responsibilities & Context Oversee day-to-day construction activities at the project sites. Monitor project progress and ensure strict adherence to project timelines. Coordinate seamlessly with architects, consultants, contractors, and suppliers. Review architectural/structural drawings, BOQs, and specifications, ensuring proper implementation on-site. Ensure full compliance with local building codes, safety regulations, and quality standards. Prepare and present project schedules, progress reports, and cost-tracking reports. Conduct regular site inspections and comprehensive quality control checks. Manage subcontractors effectively and ensure proper resource allocation. Identify and resolve technical and structural issues during the construction phase. Ensure proper documentation and reporting of all project milestones. Assist management in project budgeting, cost estimation, and variation management.
